title: Mobile Earth Science Microlearning Design Utilizing the 5E Model

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based educational environments, emphasizing work integration for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of plate tectonics through mobile activities aligned with each phase of the 5E Model.
Learners can analyze earthquake generation mechanisms using smartphone-based simulation tools.
Learners can apply earth science concepts linked to social issues (e.g., disaster response) in project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
